example.eg: Our experience has been that people don't pay unless we send them reminders.
example.egtrans: 根据我们的经验，除非发出催缴单，否则人们不会付款。

example.eg: My divorce was a very difficult experience.
example.egtrans: 离婚是我一次非常艰难的经历。

example.eg: She has had a lot of experience working with prisoners.  It is better to learn by experience than from books.
example.egtrans: 在与囚犯打交道方面，她经验丰富。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经验, 知识, 了解

example.eg: My trip round the world was quite an experience.
example.egtrans: 我的环球旅行真是次难忘的经历。

example.eg: I'm experiencing a lot of pain in my knee.
She experienced the worst time of her life in that prison.  The country is experiencing an unprecedented economic boom.
example.egtrans: 在那座监狱中，她经受了人生中最糟的时光。该国正在经历着前所未有的经济繁荣。

example.eg: Eating in a five-star restaurant makes for a memorable dining experience.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 用餐体验, 就餐感受
一生难忘的经历, 稀有的经历

example.eg: She knew from experience that the relationship was going nowhere.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 根据经验, 从经验得出, 来自于经验
从我的经验, 根据我的亲身经历

example.eg: No matter how many education classes you take, as a teacher you will primarily learn by experience in the classroom.
If you won't listen to me, I guess you'll just have to learn by experience.
Science can often provide ordinary explanations for what other people believe are mystical experiences.

dsense.name: new experience
dsense.guideword: ([sth] one has never before seen, heard, etc.)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 灵魂出窍, 离体体验

dsense.name: speaking from experience
dsense.guideword: informal (what I have learned personally is that)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经验之谈, 凭经验来说

example.eg: All students on the course undertake a period of work experience.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （针对学生的）工作经验培训项目

example.eg: To apply for the position, please provide a detailed description of your work experience.
